FuncDef:
The shutdown command enables an SR-MPLS TE Policy.
The undo shutdown command disables an SR-MPLS TE Policy.
By default, an SR-MPLS TE Policy is not disabled.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To temporarily disable an SR-MPLS TE Policy, run the shutdown command. When needed, you can run the undo shutdown command to enable the SR-MPLS TE Policy again.
